rooms.description: Spacious entrance with foyer and reception area designed for welcoming family and guests.
Open-plan living room integrated with kitchen, featuring modern decor, ample natural light from large windows placed on the east as per Vastu to promote positivity.
Fully equipped contemporary kitchen with an integrated island counter, designed for functionality and ease of movement. Placed adjacent to the living area following an open-plan layout.
Modern dining space adjacent to the kitchen-living zone, ideal for family meals and gatherings. Ensures ample light and ventilation from the south-west as per Vastu.
Dedicated study room with proper lighting and sound insulation for work or homeschooling. Located near the living area.

Spacious master bedroom featuring an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, positioned in the northeast corner for positive energy according to Vastu guidelines. Includes large windows for ample light.
Additional bedroom designed with privacy and comfort in mind, suitable for children or guests.
Another bedroom ensuring sufficient sleeping space for family members.

openings.description: Wide door connecting the entrance hall to the living room, providing smooth flow.
Large windows oriented towards the east to maximize morning light and adhere to Vastu principles.
Open sliding door that integrates kitchen with the living area seamlessly.
Window ensuring proper ventilation and adherence to Vastu guidelines for dining spaces.
Door connecting the study room with the open-plan living area.

common_areas.description: Open balcony adjoining the master bedroom and living room for relaxation and natural light exposure.
Dedicated utility area adjacent to the kitchen for storage and maintenance.

levels.notes: Floor plan designed on a 30x50 feet plot with contemporary aesthetics, open-plan living spaces following modern design trends. Vastu principles integrated by orienting main windows eastward and dining areas towards southwest to promote positive energy flow. The layout is optimized for a family of four ensuring ample personal space while maintaining cohesive communal living.
